name: RaysonSmartHomeV2
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
It is a Smart home skill to control on/off of light device.

For example, if you have a lightbulb with a friendly name "Basement Light". In Alexa, by saying "Alexa, turn on basement light", then the corresponding light will turn on. 


Currently user is required to have a Rayson Lightbulb to use this skill.
